JUDGES: Anatoly Kovler;Elisabeth Steiner;George Nicolaou;Julia Laffranque;Khanlar Hajiyev;Mirjana Lazarova Trajkovska
TEXT: The applicant , PERSON , is a NORP national who was born in DATE and lives in the town of GPE in GPE . ORG ( “ the Government ” ) were represented by ORG and ORG , ORG of GPE at ORG .
The facts of the case , as submitted by the parties , may be summarised as follows .
The applicant was a military serviceman .

On DATE ORG ( “ the Khabarovsk Court ” ) ruled in the applicant ’s favour . It declared certain actions of ORG Commissioner ( “ the Regional Commissioner ” ) unlawful . ORG further ordered the Regional Commissioner to appoint the applicant to a specific post , to send him for medical examination and to pay him certain monetary sums . The applicant was also granted monetary compensation for the nonpecuniary damage caused by the Regional Commissioner ’s unlawful actions .
On DATE ORG judgment was mainly upheld on appeal by ORG .
On DATE the applicant was appointed to the post pursuant to the judgments in his favour .

The Regional Commissioner invited the applicant to undergo the medical examination on DATE . The applicant failed to arrive to the hospital of ORG of the Interior for that purpose either on DATE or on any date thereafter .
The monetary compensation ordered by ORG judgment of DATE was fully paid to the applicant ’s account in several tranches in DATE and DATE .

On DATE FAC ( “ FAC ” ) again found for the applicant . It declared the Regional Commissioner ’s order on the applicant ’s discharge unlawful . ORG further ordered the Regional Commissioner to reinstate the applicant , to re - calculate his salary and to pay compensation to him and to give him DATE of paid leave . ORG judgment was upheld on appeal by ORG on DATE .

On DATE the applicant was formally re - instated by the Regional Commissioner pursuant to ORG judgment of DATE . The applicant was informed accordingly by the letter of the acting Regional Commissioner of DATE . He was also invited to report to the Regional Commissioner ’s office in order to comply with other formalities . The documents in question were handed over to the applicant on DATE .

As the applicant failed to arrive to his office , the Regional Commissioner on DATE decided to deposit the monetary award due to the applicant with a bank account which had been opened for that purpose with ORG .

On DATE the military officials attempted to hand down the corresponding documents to the applicant personally but he refused to take them . In DATE the applicant received the documents which had been mailed to him .

Relevant domestic law and practice are summarized , among many other judgments and decisions of the ORG , in PERSON and Others v. GPE , QUANTITY . CARDINAL , DATE and CARDINAL , § § DATE , CARDINAL DATE .
